      • getHTMLTemplate

        java.lang.String getHTMLTemplate(java.lang.String filename)
        Gets a HTML template file contents.
        Parameters:
        filename - the template file name without extension. Example: "topic-page" //topic-page.html
        Returns:
        the content of the html template file if found, otherwise, null.
